75e23a24b842d1d0e1e01ab61d17c63a.question_template: donne moi les note de ma fille pour la {codeperiexam}
75e23a24b842d1d0e1e01ab61d17c63a.sql_template:
SELECT em.libematifr AS matiere, ed.moyemati AS moyenne, ex.codeperiexam AS codeTrimestre 
FROM Eduperiexam ex, Edumoymaticopie ed, Edumatiere em, Eleve e 
WHERE e.idedusrv = ed.idenelev 
AND ed.codemati = em.codemati 
AND ex.codeperiexam = ed.codeperiexam 
AND e.Idpersonne IN (7818) 
AND ed.moyemati NOT LIKE '0.00' 
AND ed.codeperiexam = {codeperiexam};

7d5baf24f70ed5aae78ab2e244663f8e.question_template: donne moi les moyennes par mati√®res de l'eleve d'id {IDPersonne} pour la {codeperiexam}
7d5baf24f70ed5aae78ab2e244663f8e.sql_template:
SELECT em.libematifr AS matiere, ed.moyemati AS moyenne, ex.codeperiexam AS codeTrimestre 
FROM Eduperiexam ex, Edumoymaticopie ed, Edumatiere em, Eleve e 
WHERE e.idedusrv = ed.idenelev 
AND ed.codemati = em.codemati 
AND ex.codeperiexam = ed.codeperiexam  
AND e.Idpersonne IN ({IDPersonne}) 
AND ed.moyemati NOT LIKE '0.00' 
AND ed.codeperiexam = {codeperiexam};
